features: Front pocket for quick access items
Internal security pocket with key clip
Breathable shoulder harness with 2 zippered pockets accommodate soft flasks
Reservoir clip in bladder compatible inside of main compartment
Highly breathable AeroForm pack panel and anti-barrelling frame sheet enhance carrying comfort
Lightweight and durable high tenacity fabric with a liquid crystal polymer ripstop grid
Front bungee compression system and webbing daisy chain
